name: Deniz
description: Deniz is a spotty 4 years old rabbit and comes from Turkey. She is great for cuddles!

name: Izzy
description: Izzy is a fluffy, brown cow from the UK. She is 4 months old and was born on our farm.

name: Amy
description: Amy is 3 months old and from the UK. Pink and cuddly, super adorable, she is your new best friend.

name: Sarah
description: Sarah is 4 years old and recently joined us from the Swiss Alps!

name: Ryan
description: Ryan is 10 months old and from the UK. His mother sadly passed away so we look after him now.

name: Alison
description: Alison is 10 years old and from the UK. She is a spritely, energetic ball of cuddliness

name: Amber
description: Amber is a fluffy highland cow, very cute and friendly. She is our oldest cow and has been with us for a while, nearing up to her 16th birthday!

name: Ted
description: slow-moving and has a great sense of humour

name: Caitlin
description: sleeps a lot, occasionally aggressive towards turtles
